categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: While Order 66—carried out during the final stages of the Clone Wars—saw the death of the vast majority of the Jedi Order, this individual survived. A Rodian, he was present on the planet of Shumari, along with numerous other Jedi during a battle against the Darth Vader and the forces of the Galactic Empire. Many of the Jedi were massacred, although at least one, Tao, survived to be trained by Lord Vader.
